name: Fourth of July
description:
Slightly belated Fourth of July celebration game made in two hours.

Featuring simple arcade-style score attack fun, you jump from firework to firework to stay in the air.  Dodge the snowballs that threaten to freeze you and the fireworks going up!

A and D or arrow keys to move horizontally

Spacebar lets you double jump, which resets after bouncing on a firework

Try to bounce on as many fireworks as possible!
